explanation: [0-0] On a rural road, a person wearing a red shirt and colorful pants is standing next to a tall bicycle. Holding the iron bars at the front and rear of the bicycle with both hands, the structure of the bicycle is very unique, with a very high frame, the handlebars located at the top of the frame, and the seat also set at a high position. The background is an open field, with some houses and utility poles visible in the distance, and a line of white text at the top of the screen: "Professional performance, do not imitate".
[0-2] Then the man first pushes the bicycle forward a few steps, then slowly steps on the iron bars of the bicycle and climbs to the top of the bicycle.

[2-6] Immediately afterwards, the man successfully rides the tall bicycle along the country road with a happy expression on his face, then stretches out his right hand and waves.
